item.title: Video of Real Life Minority Report
item.description: I think my hands would sweat in those gloves and probably my arms would get tired from fighting with the computers. What do you think? I like the ominous music though!

item.title: Sick Around the World, and Random Settled Thoughts.
item.description: In case you missed it, I've posted the first YouTube link to the very excellent PBS Frontline special ‘Sick Around the World.’ A Washington Post reporter went to six industrialized nations and asked how they've been able to ensure universal healthcare at a much lower cost than the US has been able to figure out.
